title: Bloodletting: Book 2.1 - Victoria
description: In Book 2.1 we get to know Victoria, the older vampire of the group. Originally from Victorian London, Vickie is strugglign to cope with the rapidly changing vampire world. As the chaos of a night hunting gone wrong unfolds, she reflects on where she's been and where they're going. It's a reflective story that explores the social politics of the vampires in The Bloodletting series.
author: Joe Humphrey
